alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 23 at 2:39AM EST until December 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM SATURDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures of 26 to 28 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures of 25 to 27 possible. * WHERE...Inland Volusia and Northern Lake Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM EST Saturday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Cover above- ground exposed pipes to protect them from freezing.
